snippet.title: Lorne - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Lorne Kickstarter is launching soon. Follows really help :) https://tinyurl.com/d8ak7rr3/

You can wishlist Lorne here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2172970/Lorne/ 
Come join our discord  https://discord.gg/aWbGS6Ugas to give me feedback on how to make the game great.

Lorne is a beautiful open-world adventure. Play as a ranger, craft, fight and explore the world of Lorne in order to hunt down giant monsters. I have been working Lorne as a solo dev since October 2022. 

The feedback and support I have received from the community is amazing. Thank you!
